newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Engen chemical tanker ready for launch.
newsitem.headline: Engen chemical tanker ready for launch.

text.p: Unicorn Lines said on Wednesday its latest chemical/oil tanker, owned jointly with Engen Ltd, will be launched in Poland at the weekend.
The 45,000 dwt Engen Simunya is the second such tanker in the Engen/Unicorn fleet. The first, Engen Rainbow, was launched in August.

"The launching signifies a further step in the $65 million shipbuilding project which was initiated by the two organisations in 1994 in line with Engen's strategy to develop the African bulk fuel market," Unicorn said in a statement.
The tanker was built at Poland's Szczecin shipyard.
The tankers will transport cargoes on Engen's coastal and export trading routes.
